name: Zucchini, Pork, and Peppers
author: Mary Beth Hanford
summary: This has been in our family for years. It's great for get togethers -- just to put out in an electric frying pan and let everyone enjoy. Serve on fresh Italian bread.
ingredients: 4  Hungarian hot peppers, seeded and chopped
2  green bell peppers, seeded and chopped
1 (1 pound) loaf Italian bread, thickly sliced
directions: In a large skillet over medium heat, cook the ground pork until evenly browned
Mix the zucchini, Hungarian hot peppers, and green bell peppers into the skillet
Season with garlic powder, salt, and pepper
Stir in the spaghetti sauce, and simmer 25 minutes, stirring occasionally
